name: ETERNIA DURASLIM CASEMENT
description: A premium aluminium casement door and window system designed for superior insulation, durability, and aesthetics.
features: Superior Insulation – Advanced sealing technology ensures excellent thermal and acoustic performance.
Durable Construction – Made with high-quality aluminium and robust hardware for long-lasting performance.
Elegant Aesthetics – Sleek design with multiple handle options for a refined look.

name: ETERNIA DURASLIM CASEMENT TILT & TURN
description: Seamless Operation – Our tilt and turn windows offer versatile functionality, allowing you to tilt them for secure ventilation or fully turn them for easy cleaning and maximum airflow. Energy-Efficient Design – With superior sealing and insulation, our tilt and turn windows help enhance energy efficiency, keeping your home comfortable and reducing energy costs.
features: Seamless Operation – Our tilt and turn windows offer versatile functionality, allowing you to tilt them for secure ventilation or fully turn them for easy cleaning and maximum airflow.
Energy-Efficient Design – With superior sealing and insulation, our tilt and turn windows help enhance energy efficiency, keeping your home comfortable and reducing energy costs.

name: ETERNIA DURASLIM EDGE LIFT & SLIDE
description: Lift and Slide aluminium doors are designed and engineered for effortless sliding, maximum safety, and superior noise insulation.
features: Enhanced Security – Lockable at any point along the track for added safety.
Seamless Operation – Heavy-duty rollers ensure smooth sliding.
Peaceful Indoors – Exceptional noise insulation for a quieter space.

name: ETERNIA DURASLIM EDGE MINIMAL
description: Slimline aluminium doors designed with ultra-slim interlocks and flush profiles for wider, uninterrupted views and a touch of luxury.
features: Flawless Aesthetics – Seamless design, flush on all four sides.
Ultra-Slim Interlock – Sleek 20mm thickness for a refined look, with an option to customize for enhanced aesthetics.
Expansive Views – Wider openings with minimal sightlines.
Smooth, Hassle-Free Gliding – High-quality rollers ensure effortless sliding, while the carriage design of rollers allows for easy maintenance.

name: ETERNIA DURASLIM EDGE SLIDE & FOLD
description: A Slide and Fold aluminium door, designed and engineered to provide maximum opening.
features: Unobstructed Openings – Designed for a complete and expansive opening.
Seamless Integration – Flushed bottom track design ensures a smooth, uninterrupted floor transition.
Effortless Operation – Heavy-duty hinges enable smooth and reliable folding.

name: DURASLIM SLIDING WINDOWS & DOORS
description: A modern aluminium sliding door and window system designed for effortless operation, contemporary aesthetics, and flexible configurations.
features: Effortless Sliding – Smooth and reliable operation for everyday convenience.
Versatile Options – Available in 2-track and 3-track variants for different space requirements.

name: ETERNIA ESSENTIALS CASEMENT
description: A robust and easy-to-maintain aluminium casement door and window system designed for durability, aesthetics, and flexibility.
features: Low-Maintenance Durability – Compact design ensures lasting performance with minimal upkeep.
Refined Aesthetics – 45-degree joining on the frame and shutter enhances the visual appeal.
Versatile Functionality – Available with top-hung options for added flexibility.

name: ETERNIA ESSENTIALS proSLIDER
description: A high-performance aluminium sliding door and window system designed for enhanced security, long-lasting durability, and flexible configurations.
features: Advanced Security – Multipoint locking system ensures enhanced protection.
Long-Lasting Performance – Durable anodized aluminium track inserts provide smooth and reliable operation.
Versatile Configurations – Available in 2-track, 3-track, and customizable combinations of up to 8 tracks.

name: ETERNIA ESSENTIALS SLIDER
description: A modern aluminium sliding door and window system designed for effortless operation, contemporary aesthetics, and flexible configurations.
features: Effortless Sliding – Smooth and reliable operation for everyday convenience.
Versatile Options – Available in 2-track and 3-track variants for different space requirements.

name: ETERNIA ESSENTIALS PLUS SLIDER
description: An advanced aluminium sliding door and window system engineered for superior performance, sleek aesthetics, and customizable configurations – designed to elevate modern living.
features: Effortless Sliding – Smooth and reliable operation for everyday convenience.
Sleek Design – Slimmer and sleeker profile compared to conventional sliders for a modern look.
